definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The Reapers' mines are definitely multi-purpose.
sentences.chinese: 收割者的雷肯定是多用途的。

sentences.english: End uses of warp knitted fabrics from glass filament.
sentences.chinese: 玻纖復絲經編針織物的用途。

sentences.english: The present invention also describes the uses of the combination in the production of microgel.
sentences.chinese: 還描述了其用於生產微凝膠體的用途。

sentences.english: The store also found that customers were bewildered by cutlery in general.
sentences.chinese: 該公司也顧客們對餐具的用途心存疑惑。

sentences.english: The vehicles are large and not easily adaptable to new uses.
sentences.chinese: 這些交通工具很大，不易改作新的用途。

sentences.english: The main purpose of the notebook is to help you prepare a weekly study schedule.
sentences.chinese: 這個筆記本的主要用途是幫你準備一週學習計劃。

sentences.english: The data will be used for specific purposes only, and all indentifiable information would be discarded after the conference.
sentences.chinese: 這些資料只用作特定的用途，並於活動完結後銷燬。

sentences.english: High order, high precision geopotential models have broad application.
sentences.chinese: 高階高精度地球重力場模型具有廣泛的用途。

sentences.english: GFP has also been used for more, um, creative purposes.
sentences.chinese: 綠色熒光蛋白還具有更富創造性的用途。

sentences.english: Scholars still debate over the site’s intended use. (Eitan Abramovich/AFP/Getty Images/Life.com)
sentences.chinese: 學者們仍在爲搞清楚這個地方的用途而爭論不休。

sentences.english: Concrete is a kind of budling material with is used most.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土是用量最大，用途最廣的一種建築材料。

sentences.english: With continuous researching and developing, application of foam aluminous will become more and wider.
sentences.chinese: 隨着不斷的研究和開發，泡沫鋁的用途將會更多更廣。

sentences.english: In general the uses of the two-nitriding processes are similar.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言兩種滲氮方法的用途是類似的。

sentences.english: The common emitter configuration is by far the most versatile and widely used .
sentences.chinese: 目前共發射極接法用途最多，應用最廣。

sentences.english: But I wouldn't be the first to use Botox medicinally.
sentences.chinese: 但我不會是使用肉毒桿菌素做醫療用途的第一人。

sentences.english: So, there is more useful purposes than that than just taking remainders.
sentences.chinese: 當然還有一些其他用途，不單單是取餘數。

definition: to use for the purpose of/to serve as
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
